name: Seed Rampage
description:
You are the last farmer on earth. Mad Bois are trying to get to your silo full of water and other goodness. Defend them, so you last yet another day in this godforsaken wasteland!

Controls:

  • WASD: Movement
  • LMB: Attack
  • RMB: Plant Seed (under cursor)
  • E: Harvest Plant
  • 1, 2, 3, 4, 5: Switching current Seed

Credits
